item.title: Researchers have followed over 700 people since 1938 to find the keys to happiness. Here’s what they discovered
item.description: The secret to happiness is more in our control than we think.

item.title: Sebastian Zapeta, the man accused of burning a woman to death inside a New York City subway train, reportedly used a shirt to fan the flames
item.description: Federal immigration officials say Zapeta, 33, is a Guatemalan citizen who entered the U.S. illegally.
